content: Just like Captain Mo said, overcoming setbacks is a crucial part of growth! {A豆豆眼}Hm? So... how many times have I grown from them? <style=SizeSmall>Uh... well... that's...</style>

content: Since we just got here, I wasn't sure what we might be up against, so I stocked up on all sorts of supplies.
info: 格连开店-格连闲聊_主流程文本II

content: To save space, I'll stack the boxes like this... {A惊讶}Ah! Looks like I've stacked them too high again! <style=SizeSmall>The bump on my head from the boxes last time still hasn't fully healed...</style>

content: While applying to open the shop, I learned a lot of new things about certificates, business licenses, and fire safety...

content: {A加油}Alright, time for the last warm-up before the shop opens: unpacking, sorting, labeling, and stocking the shelves.
